element-citation.article-title: Systematic investigation of the impact of operation conditions on the degradation behaviour of perovskite solar cells

ref.mixed-citation: Domanski, K., Alharbi, E.A., Hagfeldt, A., Gratzel, M., and Tress, W. (2018). Systematic investigation of the impact of operation conditions on the degradation behaviour of perovskite solar cells. Nat. Energy 3, 61−67.
